actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-407.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 284 - 116 (Record Vote No: 368).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 884) to revise and extend programs to provide price support and production incentives for farmers to assure an abundance of food and fiber, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 884 (Farm price supports).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 884) to revise and extend programs to provide price support and production incentives for farmers to assure an abundance of food and fiber, and for other purposes.
